Content:: Twenty Thousand Dollars for Seven (Italian: Kidnapping! Paga o uccidiamo tuo figlio, also known as 20.000 dollari sporchi di sangue) is a 1969 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alberto Cardone and starring Brett Halsey.[1]  This article related to an Italian film of the 1960s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This 1960s Western film–related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
